biog.entry.name: MORRISON, the Hon. Scott John
biog.entry.description: Biography for MORRISON, the Hon. Scott John
biog.entry.electorate.name: Cook
biog.entry.title: Biography for MORRISON, the Hon. Scott John
biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Member for Cook (NSW)
biog.entry.party.name: Liberal Party of Australia

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Cook, New South Wales, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Minister for Immigration and Border Protection from 18.9.13 to 23.12.14.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Joint Select: Australia's Immigration Detention Network from 21.6.11 to 30.3.12.
House of Representatives Standing: Health and Ageing from 11.3.08 to 25.9.08; Family, Community, Housing and Youth from 25.9.08 to 30.11.09; Economics from 11.8.09 to 3.2.10.
Joint Statutory: Public Accounts and Audit from 11.3.08 to 25.9.08.
Joint Standing: Electoral Matters from 11.3.08 to 3.2.10; Migration from 3.2.10 to 10.2.10.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Member, Opposition Shadow Ministry from 22.9.08 to 18.9.13. Shadow Minister for Housing and Development from 22.9.08 to 8.12.09; Shadow Minister for Immigration and Citizenship from 8.12.09 to 18.9.13; Shadow Minister for Productivity and Population from 14.9.10 to 18.9.13.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: National Manager, Policy and Research Property Council of Australia 1989-95.
Deputy Chief Executive, Australian Tourism Task Force 1995-96.
Director, NZ Office of Tourism and Sport 1998-2000.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south-eastern Sydney; it includes the suburbs of Bonnet Bay, Burraneer, Caringbah, Caringbah South, Como, Cronulla, Dolans Bay, Grays Point, Gymea, Gymea Bay, Kangaroo Point, Kareela, Kirrawee, Kurnell, Lilli Pilli, Miranda, Oyster Bay, Port Hacking, Sylvania, Sylvania Waters, Taren Point, Woolooware, Yowie Bay and parts of Jannali and Sutherland.
Industries: petroleum refineries at Kurnell, steel fabrication, pharmaceutical plant, boat building and oyster farming.
State electorates: Cook includes the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Cronulla, and parts of Heathcote and Miranda.
